job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: Title: Devops Engineer Location: USA, Remote Duration: Contract Note: Client is only looking for US Citizens Required Skills/Experience The minimum requirements for this role are as follows: 2+ years of experience as DevOps engineer, SRE, software engineer, or system engineer Proven programming skills (Python, Linux Shell, Java, Go, etc.) Hands-on experience in Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, Ansible, Terraform and Linux OS is required Hands-on experience with the following technologies is a definite plus AWS GovCloud and services such as S3, ECS, EC2, CloudFront, Lambda, Route 53, ElastiCache and RDS Jenkins, Groovy, Harness, Artifactory, Maven, or similar CI/CD pipelines related tools and technologies If you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com or call me at (925) 218-2347 . Looking forward to hearing from you!
